review: I can hear bass sound
They like grilled bass
Very clear sound a bathtub and easy to use
A little fresh air might clear some of the cobwebs.
It was clear that he do not understand what i am said but also what i wished to, very poor service. disappointing
Very awesome and polite made sure we had everything we needed and even got us an early check-in.
They gave us ideas on tourist activities we could partake in for our stay we even got gift bags over all i loved it will visits again

Excellent service! Got our room early! Very friendly and gave us great advice about the city as hotel! Room is beautiful! Would definitely recommend this hotel and Allison and Alam were very nice and informative
To summarise this stay during our visit to New York in September, it was truly overly expensive
the service at reception was awful, we were ignored by the reception staff, the rooms were little more basic than we expected and the price we paid did not even include breakfast the next day.
Could not wait to leave the next day!
First let me say this hotel smelled sooo good when you walk in!
Second the service was AMAZING!! Especially Alam and Allison,they made sure we was in our room before the 4 PM check-in which was Awesome!! And
the location of this hotel is right of this hotel is right where u want to be!!
Definitely will stay here again! Thanks again Alam and Allison!

Alam and Allison were very helpful when we arrived they immediately took care of us, they got us situated with our room gave us some recommendations on where to enjoy our stay and explained all we needed to know to make this trip a success!! Would definitely recommend this hotel!!

We received the best service ever once we walked in! Everyone was very welcoming, they tools care of us, recommend an awesome breakfast place to eat while our room was being serviced! 10:10 would stay here again

We came to the hotel totally exhausted after a long drive from Toronto. Met Mr. Alam and Mrs. Allison in the lobby. Mrs. Allison gave us a great room in the 20th story with excellent city view. Mr. Alam helped us with the luggages and show the amenities briefly. Great experience.

I am Mitch alarm at the lobby and I made Alison she is so pretty and very helpful she give me the very nice room on 20 flor and alarm help me out with the luggage storage show us the room everything and
The hotel is clean and comfortable.
Convenient to subway .
The staff is very helpful and courteous.
The rooms and bed was very comfortable.
Nice coffee and baked goods

My friend Paul and I came here to visit friends We had a good experience here Mohammed and dolly were very friendly , They explained to us of some tourist attractions around the area definitely will come back here again
Stayed 7 days on the 16th floor. Fantastic location.
Old carpet that is a trip hazard. Filthy bathtub. Peeling paint. Dirty walls.
Phone did not work. Electrical wires hanging out of the wall. Generally unclean. Old paint. The lobby has been refurbished but that is it.
The breakfast to go was not free.
Some staff were wonderful and some were rude.

Awesome awesome awesome time in NYC!!!! Me and my crew had good times in the city! When we arrived we were greeted by the most amazing hostess, Allison. It could have really been a bad experience, but Allison change all of that. Simple smile and the way she spoke touch our soul. We appreciate the kind of service because normally folks do not write about the good but I could not let this one pass. Well appreciated!!!

Had a lovely night out with my wife. Allison gave us a upgrade to a nicer room. She was very helpful to our needs. She deserve a promotion. We were having trouble with our room and she was very accommodating. Thanks Allison
Had a wonderful experience at Manhattan Times Square hotel.
Allison was exceptional at the front office, she made sure me and my wife had a wonderful stay after a rough day.
We were literally in the middle of everything bars, restaurants and lots of retail stores.
Check-in today for one night on the 18th floor and I love the room.
Great view and good service. Aerial gave us free breakfast for the one night that we are here which was really nice of her. I plan on coming back very soon

Second time staying at this location and i have to say the service is great! Check-in and Ariel at the front desk immediately remembered me. It is not often I check into a hotel and that happens, especially in nyc!
We had a very nice stay in the manhattan at Times Square hotel!
Hotel is in a great location.
Alam helped make our stay very easy and comfortable.
I would happily stay in this hotel again if I return to New York City.

My wife and our two little toddlers are really exhausted from our long haul fight. We arrived at the hotel early than the advertised check-in time We are greeted by a friendly staff named Mohammad. He was very accommodating and helpful in sorting the room for us. Even gave us free vouchers for breakfast! Appreciate his help a lot!
Great stay at a very convenient location in New York especially if one is visiting NY for the first time.
Mr. Mohammad at the front desk was exceptionally helpful and courteous. We were assigned rooms quite promptly on the 22nd floor.

Location of this hotel is just perfect....just two blocks from the hustle and bustle of Times square and Broadway shows,yet quiet and peaceful. There are atleast 4 subway stations at walking distance from the hotel. Taxis are easily available too. Most tourist attractions are at waliking distance .
The rooms are clean
bathrooms well maintained with hair dryers provided.
The carpetting on the floor may need a bit more cleaning but rest is just fine.
Fabulous... thank you to Alam and Mohamed! Such a perfect start to our getaway weekend. Super helpful and friendly with hotel information and what to do while in NYC
Great hotel in a great location
We had a very nice stay in the manhattan at Times Square hotel! Hotel is in a great location.
Alam helped make our stay very easy and comfortable. I would happily stay in this hotel again if I return to New York City.

My wife and our two little toddlers are really exhausted from our long haul fight. We arrived at the hotel early than the advertised check-in time We are greeted by a friendly staff named Mohammad. He was very accommodating and helpful in sorting the room for us. Even gave us free vouchers for breakfast! Appreciate his help a lot!

I have stayed in the city a lot and was blown away at the customer service I received from Allison. She was accommodating and got us in a little before check-in time and even put us in a great room with a view.
Rooms were clean and the hotel quiet.
The bellman was awesome too!

What is so special about having a hotel room on this particular floor is that a single hotel elevator is designated to be used only for its guests and so this elevator travels one stop from the hotel lobby to the 18th floor and then back within just a few minutes thereby eliminating the time one may waste traveling in an often slower hotel elevator.

Check-in tonight for a business trip. I usually stay further downtown but everything was sold out. Was greeted by the receiptionist Aerial who helped me with my surroundings and also gave me breakfast for my one night here. No complaints from me!

Staying at this hotel and I just wanted to acknowledge Aerial for great customer service. The hotel does not have umbrella and she let me use her personal one which was so nice of her. Thanks again Aerial
Star and Muhammad were so helpful at check-in. This is our first time in New York and we are with a architecture grupo and are excited to see the City and all it has.
But the traffic is horrible.
Great location very near to everything.
Not here for the rooms just here to see the city so the condition does not matter to me really.
The bed is comfortable and the AC is working.
Reviews had me on the fence about that but Aerial made sure I had a room with the best AC ever!
A lot of AC trouble in the rooms. Moved to two different rooms before there was a functioning one.
Thank you to Aerial for the breakfast as compensation it is truly appreciated.
Location is well and the price is not bad.
Well placed hotel, close to all amenities,
well used and well worn must have been very good 15yrs ago but now very tired,
nice staff helpful,room service very good,
But watch out for the hidden costs facility fees $30 per day what facilities, No bar, No restaurant or eating facilities No pool, plenty in the area but No facilities on site, 2 star only No more!

This hotel was amazing but the service was impeccable ! Alam was an absolute gentleman, he made our stay so comfortable, from when we arrived to when we left he did everything to such a high standard !

Alam and mr Mohmameed both the guy are very cooperative and very gentle and they showed me the fire exit the safe water station how make international call and the tv channel and all my questions fulf

Mr alam bell man and me mahmomeed from front desk   They are very nice and there service is very good . I request the hotel do not leave them hotel location is very good alam showed me how to make call ..

I really had a great experience!!!!!! The people at front desk are extremely HELPFUL!!!!!!! I was assisted by Starena and Mohammad!!! They are the greatest ever!  Super professional! And i travel a lot! But i can tell for sure they are the best ever !!!!!!!! I would recommend everyone to go to this hotel especially because u will be treated on a high level!

Super helpful and friendly. Kindly explained everything that we need too know about the room and hotel, made the start of our experience a good one! Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting New York!
First time to New York but it is not the last time.
Our hotel was centrally located and comfortable.
Only problem was that the breakfast was not included.
Our overall stay was good. Mohammad from front desk and alam was helpful throughout the stay.
We were able to check-in early with an upgrade and received quick and pleasant service the room.
Was beautiful room with a very nice view.
It is a nice area with plenty of parking garages and restaurants close by.

Alam, and Allison were very helpful, and kind! We have received great service on our honeymoon. If we come back to Manhattan we will definitely be staying here again. The consideration that was shown to my wife, and I will not be forgotten.
Hotel is lovely, a little dated but that is what gives it so much character, in an excellent location!  It was my first visit to New York and it was the best time ever.

Hotel staff are lovely and very helpful especially Alam!  Anything we needed he helped us with without question, he is such a lovely guy!! He made us feel so welcome and like home, he is a proper top guy and he is the reason I would come back to this hotel again !!  He helped sort everything out for my boyfriend on the day he proposed to me.  Thanks so much for everything you have done for us on this trip.
Excelent Hotel and service , Mohamed Chowquay the brekfast employe is a very nice person. He gives a great service to all guests.
The hotel is good to come back and great location. All is very excelent!
Great hotel, good location, close to metro, Central Park, and great service as well.
The bartender Mohammed Chowduny takes very good care of the guests. Very serviceable and helpful always. Definitely good place to come back!
Excellent location near to everywhere

excellent service too, Mohamed the person who serves breakfast is very nice and gives a great service! I really recommend this hotel, great service, good price and I was very happy during my stay there
Mohamend was extremely helpful, nothing to much trouble. Showed us everything we needed to know about our room and told us evrrything we needed to know about the hotel and the area.
The hotel was in a great location, very assessable to all the attreactions.

Muhammad was so lovely went we went to the front desk and so helpful! Alam was amazing! he took us up to the room showed us everything, and told us everything we needed to know about New York as this was our first time in the city! he is a lovely person and an absolute asset to the hotel.

Arrived at the hotel and was greeted with a warm and welcoming smile by Allison. Of course no rooms were available for early check-in but she took our phone number and was sure to call us as she promised when the room was available.
The hotel is centrally located in the heart of the city, we have a room on the 18th floor,
it was clean and had a really nice bathroom with rain shower.
Thank you for taking care of us Allison, will definitely return.
This hotel is very good and especially Mohammed chowdhury really very good service and he very lovy guy I will come this hotel er Very year 3 time in future I will be back,
Hotel is very good location.closed to everythings
The room was great, 2 king sized beds, air con, hot drink facilities and maids every day, the room was very clean, view not the best but not bad either and we was not stopping in our room much anyway

The location was very close to Times Square itself so in the evenings you do get a bit of noise such as car horns and police etc but that is to be expected anywhere in Times Square  It was very close to subway stations, theatres and many many restaurants, literally a Starbucks, Duane reade, fast food place and many others within a 2 minute walk, 5th Avenue was a 5 minute walk, so for me this hotel was perfect location wise
we are planning on coming back in 2020 for 2 weeks and plan on using this hotel again!   Thank you, can not wait to come back!
First time to New York but it is not the last time.
Our hotel was centrally located and comfortable.
Our overall stay was good. Mohammad from front desk and alam was helpful throughout the stay.
Only problem was that the breakfast was not included.
We were able to check-in early with an upgrade and received quick and pleasant service the room. Was beautiful room with a very nice view.
It is a nice area with plenty of parking garages and restaurants close by.

Alam, and Allison were very helpful, and kind! We have received great service on our honeymoon. If we come back to Manhattan we will definitely be staying here again. The consideration that was shown to my wife, and I will not be forgotten.
Hotel is lovely, a little dated but that is what gives it so much character,
in an excellent location!  It was my first visit to New York and it was the best time ever.

Hotel staff are lovely and very helpful especially Alam!  Anything we needed he helped us with without question, he is such a lovely guy!! He made us feel so welcome and like home, he is a proper top guy and he is the reason I would come back to this hotel again !!  He helped sort everything out for my boyfriend on the day he proposed to me.  Thanks so much for everything you have done for us on this trip.

Excelent Hotel and service , Mohamed Chowquay the brekfast employe is a very nice person. He gives a great service to all guests. The hotel is good to come back and great location. All is very excelent!
Great hotel: good location, close to metro, Central Park, and great service as well.
The bartender Mohammed Chowduny takes very good care of the guests. Very serviceable and helpful always. Definitly good place to come back!
Excellent location close to everything
Mohamed the person who serves breakfast is very nice and gives a great service!
I really recommend this hotel, great service, good price and I was very happy during my stay there
Mohamend was extremely helpful, nothing to much trouble. Showed us everything we needed to know about our room and told us evrrything we needed to know about the hotel and the area.
The hotel was in a great location, very assessable to all the attreactions.

Muhammad was so lovely went we went to the front desk and so helpful! Alam was amazing! he took us up to the room showed us everything, and told us everything we needed to know about New York as this was our first time in the city! he is a lovely person and an absolute asset to the hotel.

Arrived at the hotel and was greeted with a warm and welcoming smile by Allison. Of course no rooms were available for early check-in but she took our phone number and was sure to call us as she promised when the room was available.
The hotel is centrally located in the heart of the city,
we have a room on the 18th floor, it was clean
had a really nice bathroom with rain shower.
Thank you for taking care of us Allison, will definitely return.
This hotel is very good and especially Mohammed chowdhury really very good service and he very lovy guy I will come this hotel er Very year 3 time in future I will be back.
Hotel is very good location.closed to everythings

Guillermo is an excellent employee with a very good disposition and kindness to help every guest. Looks like he really want everybody to have a great experience while enjoying the hotel and the city. Truly amazing person and very valuable person for the hotel. Thanks

Hotel service is excellent. We stopped for breakfast but were delayed. Both Dolly and Mohammed at the breakfast service went out of their way to help us out and opened up breakfast for us - We could not have asked for a more friendly and warm staff. Setting a new standard for service.

I choose this property based on location. It reads as a 3 until 4 star hotel but in reality its a  1 until 2 star hotel!!!! Service was exceptional which made up for the physical hotel. the elevators were filthy, the hallways were untouched for at least 30 until 40 years and extremely depressing and makes you question why you are staying there.
the room itself was most likely redone around 20 until 25 years ago and the bathroom was disgusting.
Floors, baseboards and bathtub were all dirty and worn out.
I travel around the world and would never recommend this property with so many choices in NYC!!!!

Mohammed and Dolly are the best breakfast hosts! They made sure me and my girlfriend ate well and catered to our needs. Overall we enjoyed our stay at the manhattan time square hotel, the room was nice and clean, and the breakfast was delicious

The customer service in this hotel is top notch especially from Mohammed and Delores at the breakfast bar. Our family was treated very well and both of them did everything in their power to make our stay memorable. Thank you guys! We will definitely come back on our next visit to NY!
Very friendly and warm service , helpful people .kind attention to Details.
we very happy with our Breakfast . Enjoyed the Breakfast here . Everything is very Good and Nice.
Best location in Manhattan area ,
Had wonderful friendly service from Mohammed and Dolly. Lovely people. And concierge Gloria also very helpful.
Hotel is very good location close to everything .
The only good thing about this hotel was the location!
Avoid this hotel it was filthy carpet not hoovered and the bath had hair in it and a dirty scum ring around it! Toilet was loose.
The room was outdated and desperately needed painting horrible furniture. Limited tea and coffee.
Staff were ok.
Check-in late and was promised a suite and when I reached the hotel that room was not available.
Aerial was kind enough to help me out and to find a better room for my gift birthday. Really appreciate her
Choosing this place was definitely the best decision ever.
I met Allison Sarvic, the receptionist. She was suchh a great human being. Her customer was beyond exceptional. She received us with a great smile. Wow.

I met Alam, He make me feel like home. It was really nice meeting him. Honestly this is the first time I see that. He was very professional. Excellent service. Everything was perfect. Think you very much.
Choosing this place was a best idea. I would like to come back.
Our first time to the Big Apple to celebrate my retirement from the Army and my wife birthday.
Great location with a balcony overlooking Times Square.
Got to the room and the air conditioner was broken.

Thank you very much Alam and Allison for the great service provided at The Manhattan hotel. Alam carried out baggage to the room, showed us how to have the coffee machine, and told us about places to see in the New York. Allison provided quick service during the check-in process. We will definitely visit this hotel again during the next New York City trip.

They are amazing!! They give us early check-in and birthday gift! They answer all our questions and they are so nice!!   Alam explain to us where is the water machine, all the services, the coffe machine.   Great experience with them!!
I like this hotel very much, the location is wonderful.
Thanks especially to Mohammed and Dolly for our delicious breakfast. They are kind and professional even with our babies.

Arrived at the hotel for one night tonight just to have some Friday night fun in the city. Ariel helped us find a cool sports bar and a hookah lounge. Thanks for the suggestions. Will definitely be back soon
disappointed in the rooms
the breakfast was great
the service at this hotel is some of the best service I ever experienced in New York.
Thank you Aerial for being so helpful and understanding our frustrations.
Hotel is centrally located on 7th Ave midway between Times Sq and Central Park.

The hotel itself is desperately in need of renovation. The rooms are furnished with horrible old dark wood furniture that was chipped and stained , the bathroom was grimy and the lack of a fridge is bizarre these days. The floor mounted air conditioning unit in the bedroom was ancient and noisy. The corridors outside were shabby and the carpets manky. The walls are wafer thin and we were kept awake by the shouting of other guests or constant banging and crashing from outside.
It is the first hotel I have stayed in in NYC were I felt genuinely uneasy lying in bed. Being charged $9 for a bottle of water was the final straw.
I would not stay at the Manhattan Hotel again. I suggest you do not either.
When we arrived... the room was nothing like the pictures....old and used up, but the air conditioner worked when we arrived.
We went to dinner and when we got back the air conditioner was making a terrible sound, we called for maintenance at 9:30, by 11:00 they said they could not fix it.
Luckily they had another room, the new room had a soft renovation on a different floor.
We were happy with it. It was clean, newer and the air worked. When we left on Saturday, a bell person held our luggage while we went to breakfast.

Very helpful, helped us check-in early and carry bags to the room. Very friendly and outgoing personality. He is also very funny! He also recommended places to eat around NYC! Thanks Mohammed, you are awesome!

The experience with this hotel, staff, and especially Alam was wonderful. They were very accommodating with our luggages and needs from the moment we walked in. Alam brought our bags upstairs to the room and was friendly throughout which is all you really need in a hotel, friendly and helpful staff.

When arriving at the Manhattan at time square, we received a fantastic welcome by Alam, he was most helpful showing us to our room, showing us how to use the WiFi and all other facilities.  Thanks again for all your help after the long flight we had.

We had a fantastic stay at The Manhattan at Times Square! We received amazing service from Alam and Mohamed during our stay and would highly recommend to friends and families! The friendly, personable approach of these guys made all the difference and made our stay super special! We will be back! Thanks for a great trip!

Great service when we arrive  To hotel, They are  The WiFi , breakfast, the international call  Had an incredible stay at the Manhattan at Times Square because the staff here is phenomenal !!  The hotel is very good
I am enjoying my stay over here, I check-in yesterday on my birthday and I am loving it
the staff is really nice and welcoming specially Mr. Mohammad who helped me with my check-in and gave us a really nice room on 20th floor with a cool view of the New york city.
It is a very old hotel in the heart of new york city with all modern amenities
amazing location . I highly recommend it.
The lobby is beautiful but our rooms were outdated and shabby.
The location is perfect but hope by the time we get to visit again it is had some work.
They provide a grab and go breakfast sack lunch style which is a great idea.
All the employees were friendly and helpful.
We received amazing customer service from Senka at the front desk. She took great care of us from the minute we walked in. She gave us great tourist advice!
This hotel is AMAZING and right in the middle of where all the action is.
Location, location, location! Made a pit stop here in Times Square and this location was perfect.
I really wish the company would update the hotel because it is definitely the place to be when in Times Square.
Ariel checked us in and helped us out with cool restaurants for our short stay
Such a great hotel for staying with your family,or like couple or even friends,
all the staff are so nice and they enjoy helping people when they are in need , specially SENKA ,she is the best one so helpful

Checked into this hotel last night and it was very hectic when I arrived. I could overhead hear the receptionist telling others that their rooms were not ready at 9pm. VERY ANNOYING! For them and a guest.
I wanted to take the time to do this review to commend Aerial because she did an excellent job handling the situation. Not only for myself but the other guests I witnessed her helping!
Service was good
but the hotel itself was not great.
It is not 4 star, like it says.  The smell in the lobby is over powering and the rooms are worn down.

Watch out for the hidden costs of £50+ for a facility fee at the end of our stay ??? Like what even is that! The hotel we stayed in previously the night before, had no additional costs, therefore we felt cheated. Not worth it!
Its my first time in USA and the stay in this hotel made it even more memorable.
The rooms are spacious, comfortable and the view outside is fantastic.
The staff is extremely helpful and I must mention Mr. Mohammed Chowdary at the breakfast counter for his excellent communication skills.
Our first time in New York, in the hotel at six in the morning Mohammad was great he helped us get a room with a king size bed in less that an hour. Great stuff!
but the bed had or probably still has a left and right dimple very uncomfortable,
but the most annoying thing it had no television and the smell of smoke from the neighbors was intense.
If you want a budget hotel in a central location this place is great.
If you can afford it upgrade to executive as we stayed there for a night and it felt 5*.
The breakfast guys mohammed and William were amazing. They always have a smile on their faces and are extremely helpful.
Beware Baggage people only want tips and will actually ask for them whilst talking to you passive aggressively.
Similarly a woman working at the help desk tried selling tour bus tickets for three days and got angry when we refused.
To finish on a possitive note you are 10 minutes walk away from central park, the empire state building and Times Square.

Mohammed Chowdury is the light is the whole establishment. We had a chance to chat and I was shocked to learn that he has been with this hotel since 1984. He is so kind and super friendly to all the guests. The smile on his face makes you want to return for a coffee refill.
My room was so great and with a nice view and the bed was very comfortable.
I will definitely return to this hotel for Mohammed, indeed. Joseph!
Amazing location,
helpful staff, shout out to aerial who gave us breakfast when we check-in. The little things go a long way and we appreciate it. I mean who doesn’t love free Starbucks coffee in the morning?
Our first time in new york, its our first time here. We are from belgium we like the hotel alot
Senka from the desk was verry helpfull! Im happy to be here!
The hotel is close to both times square and central park.
Rooms are outdated but there are some slightly renovated ones.
The agent Ariel was fantastic and helped me get into one of those! Thankkkkkkssssss Ariellllllllllllll

Guillermo is very welcoming and help me with my accommodations. Originally my room came with one bed but Guillermo helped me in a pitch to find a room with two beds. I came to sight see with my dad and spend a couple days over here.
There were bugs in the bathroom, coating the shower. Mold in shower. In smelled so bad that I would not shower in it.
I complained they cleaned it making it smell better, but the mold was still there and the bugs just came back.
I found out they have a contract with the city and house homeless people. The contract is guaranteed income and they are not concerned with return customers. Bad experience!
While the decor is dated, our room was clean.
The staff are very friendly and helpful.
The location is perfect. Far enough from the crowds but close enough that you can walk to many of the main attractions like Time Square, MOMA, Rockefeller Centre.

Guillermo  Very helpful and accommodating with all of my needs. I’ve travel extensively through the world and I must say he is an awesome individual. Made me feel like anything I need he would assist.
The rooms are clean and well organized.
Employees are very friendly, but Guillermo was the highlight of my trip.
Good location. Value for money.
Room size are good.
Good city view from Hotel.
One thing bad- No Free Internet.
Shopping area- tourist attraction point at Manhattan all are near by walking distance. Overall good place to stay.
The room quality was extremely poor. Dated and not comfortable even though we upgraded. The bathroom was dirty and unpracticle. The toilet sounded like a small explosion when flushed.
The breakfast set-up however was good and the grab and go was perfect for taking out when exploring the city.

The location was perfect for broadway and times square but was insanely busy at peak times. Whilst you should expect this we would probably prefer a midtown location and to travel into Times Square etc when you want.
Overall would not recommend this particular hotel to anyone, needs a lot of work.
The staff actually were annoying and would pester you every time you walked past, sometimes you just want to get on with your day.

He is the best, he is always care about you. He is a very helpful person, we have all our breakfast at the bar and it was really nice. Thank you so much for your service and to make our breakfasts really good.
The service is excellent and Mohammed breakfast Is the best.
And the hotel has the best location ever. Is close to the subway, the times square and the room is very big and we have an awesome view. We love it.
great hotel, good location.
staff is very friendly, and welcoming.
As I got an upgrade to the executive class floor, I could use the dedicated superfast elevator for the 18th floor.
In my room I had two large TVs, a couch, one super comfortable bed, a pretty large bathroom and a walk in closet.
From the bedroom I could look at the Radio City building.  In the lobby you will find a bar serving starbucks coffee in the morning. They also serve all kind of breads and some fruits.
Central to all the sights good location.
Basic hotel that is a bit outdated.
Clean rooms
No restaurant or bar on the premises so you couldn’t relax on the premises after a day out sightseeing
Staff were friendly and helpful and full of information when you had a query

Alam was super friendly and helpful.  Was always around to lend a helping hand for anything that we needed.  He gave us a lovely New York welcome.  Would recommend staying at Manhattan Times Square again

Allison on the front desk was very friendly and helpful. We arrived early and she made sure that she go us into a room quickly. We really appreciated what she did for us, it was a great first experience here.

Allison greeted us when we arrived and was an incrediblely friendly host. She answered all our questions and catered to us in a professional and kind manner. We really appreciate it, thanks so much Allison!!

Absolute AMAZING service!!!! Mohameed was very hospitable and answered all our questions professionallyor thoroughly at the front desk. Overall experience was phenomenal, we felt extremely welcomed on our trip to the big city! Will definitely be coming back.
Had an incredible stay at the Manhattan At Times Square because the staff here is phenomenal! Alam and Mohamed ensured we were taken great care of.
The hotel is located in a great spot right in Times Square walking distance from everything.
Overall had a lovely time in New York because of the great Hospitality we got from the staff here.
I think I found the only 2 polite people in this city. Mohammed and Alam were awesome.
The hotel is at a great location at a very low price. A month here might actually be cheaper than Manhattan rent.

Everything perfect, very good service. They are very attentive and they care because you enjoy an excellent breakfast. I totally recommend to stay at this hotel and to have breakfast at the hotel with them.
Excellent service and comfortable room. Mohammed and Delores made breakfast time fun.
The hotel situated in a good location.
Lovely selection of pastries fruit and coffee. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
I have stayed at this hotel many times. The location could not be any more perfect.
The rooms are very clean and bed is comfortable.
The staff, especially Allison, are very kind and courteous. It suits it is purpose for the length of time you are in a hotel room when in New York.
It was pleasure staying in the hotel after long flight as visitor. The hotel is approx. 5-7 min walk to Times Square and great location as it’s in central NYC.
Moreover, we had great service at reception from Mohammed and Allison they took care of breakfast voucher and check-in. Also, Mohammed at breakfast is a very nice guy. We had a very pleasant stay.
The hotel is clean,
good facilities and very comfortable. Overall, great experience!!!! Hope to come back again! Loved it completely !
Guillermo received me with one of the best attention I have ever received!!!!  Thanks a lot for that good check-in service.
The hotel is great a really good location; near to everything, and with good transportation

Allison was a great host. She was very friendly and professional!She engaged us and made sure we had what we need in a timely fashion!!We traveled from Atlanta,Ga for my birthday and Allison has truly made this a great one !!!Thanks Allison

Alam was very friendly and helped us with everything we needed. Very nice hotel with friendly staff. He walked us to our room and showed us how to use everything in the room from the water bags to the tv. Great visit!!!

We found the Manhattan a fabulous place to stay. We enjoyed every bit of service and looked forward to the breakfast bar every morning. Mohammed and Dolly were such a pleasure to meet, chat and have a laugh with. They really start your day off on a good note. We will definitely be back to stay.
Stayed for one night. Front desk was friendly and efficient.
Lobby upgraded however the upgrade stopped there. Our room on the 10th floor was a good size but desperately in need of a paint or repapering.

There was mold in the grout in the bathroom walls and tub. The hairdryer worked in short bursts The ironing board legs were broken and there were minimal electrical outlets to plug in our phones. No ports for computer or smart phones. No alarm clock! The TV was difficult to use. The AC worked fine. Street noise is loud.
The plus was location.

Nice and friendly hotel perfectly located near Times Square in mudtown. For those who need to explore Manhattan it is very convenient.  At the reception Senka was brilliant, very keen to help with a smile.
We spent a week in Nyc and we enjoyed every minute of it in this hotel.
Our room was at the 14th floor, clean and quite big with an amazing view... just perfect even if it was a little old fashion.
The hotels workers were so kind and they gave us all the information we needed, in particular Dolly, William and Mohamed who cuddle us for breakfast.

The hotel is also near the biggest attractions in town, like Times Square and the Rockfeller Center, and bear a lot of different places were you can enjoy your meale, like Ellens Stardust where the waiters are Broadways performers... and it also has a subway station really close so you can easily reach it from the airport with public transportation. I would definitely reccomend it.
Very old fashioned,
service terrible. No one on reception.
Air con broke down and no one attended. The mattress was broke, plug sockets hanging off the walls and wall paper peeling all over.
Not worth the money at all such a shame as great location

Allison was wonderful, and went above and beyond to make sure we chose the right room. We had plenty of time to explore our options and Allison made sure that we received every accommodation that we were entitled to. Great experience!
Great service from everyone in the hotel. Friendly and helpful staff! Alam and Allison were very helpful and helped us with all our requests! Will definitely recommend this hotel for holidays.
Clean and close to cenrer!
We had a great room with a balcony that has the perfect view of the city!
It was a fantastic experience from meeting Mohammad at check-in and having our needs taken care of the whole visit! Great service and a beautiful view that could not be beat! Thank you

Mohammed was very nice, gave us free coffee and made sure we were set and comfy before we check-out of our suite. Definitely a come again kind of hotel !! Any questions or concerns we had he made sure they were answered ! If you are ever in the NYC area this hotel is a must
Senka from the front desk,was a fantastic help,with my checking. Senka went out of her way to ensure my needs was taking care of.
Hotel has great location, close to all attractions, restaurants and Central Park.
The experience was amazing, the staff was so helpful and accommodating. They got us check-in early and helped with bags. We will definitely stay here again!
Great location and room worked out perfectly!

Mohammed and Dolly gave us excellent service!!! One of the friendliest people we ever met. They made our stay at this hotel a wonderful experience and we would definitely comeback and stay here specially because of that experience.

We are staying for 5days and 4nights. On our first morning, Mohammed and Dolly served our breakfast and they are very keen to our needs and to everyone else too! They are friendly people and loves their jobs.
Excellent service especially with their food and drinks.
Staff Mohammed and Dolly are very accommodating and approachable. They made our stay extra special which made us feel more excited and energetic to tour around this beautiful city of New York.

Dolores is a very friendly woman and Mohammed and William work very hard! They have always a smile on their faces and always wanted to talk to the visitors about everything. They are very interested in culture

Excellent service, fast and efficient. Our concierge was really nice, friendly, he helped us with things to do in New York. The welcome and the service is really good. He show us how call international. He is very good
The Manhattan is good for its price to location.
Although the halls need some reworking on their carpet as well as their bathrooms.
I have to praise both Dolly and Mohammed for their unending hospitality and kindness to us from the moment we arrived all the way to out last day

Thank you for the good service. He was extremely helpful in accommodating for me and my partner. We arrive at 9 am and we had in the room at 11 am. Thank you for the room at the 22 floor with the view..  So excellent, I recommande his service.

Alam and Mohamed Was greeted by two very welcoming staff. They treated us so well and looked after everything for us. Really made us feel welcome with lots of recommendations and advice! Super staff. Would definitely come back just for the friendly staff and wonderful service

We met Alam and Mohamed in the lobby, they were extremely friendly, and took great care of my friends and I, who were very tired after our flight! They made us feel very at home at the hotel, and made our trip thoroughly enjoyable!!

Alam was so helpful on our arrival in New York, made us feel at home in the hotel. He gave us some great advice about what to see and the best things to do in the city. He was extremely friendly and gave us such great customer service! :)

Really friendly staff and good breakfast. beautiful interior, priceor quality is nice. prices in the hotel afe also not too expensive, the staff helps you with pleasure if you ask. Also a starbucks in the hotel is always positive.
I stayed in The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, and it was nothing but wonderful.

I loved the people who greeted me, as was I particularly fond of Will and Dolores, they work at the downstairs cafe. If you should meet them, I promise you they are nothing but kind, as do they make you feel welcome and at home.
The room itself was comfortable, the bedding was unbelievably soft.
And the view of Times Square is great.
I stayed in a suite, so the room came with a long hallway and a couch near the far corner of the bed. Each addition to this room was a treasure in itself.
I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Nice lobby where you can sit and relax while waiting for your ride.
The hotel is conveniently located near the Metro Subway and 24 hrs grocery stores.
The staff is very friendly and always willing to help with anything. Special thanks to Ms. Senka for providing outstanding service during my stay at this hotel.
Great location but the hotel is a disappointment.
The service is top notch so that helps out a lot. Check-in and was given free WiFi and unlimited calls which was great! Thanks aerial we appreciate your hospitality.
In nyc for for night and was check-in by a young lady at the desk named Aerial. She gave great service and was terrific with the subway lines.
Great location
Good service Friendly staff
This is my second stay at this hotel. I stayed for 10 days and it was my excellent 10 days.
Everyone is very pleasant and professional and cared for me.
From the breakfast, housekeepers and front desk, especially Senka, who always treated me friendly and polite. Thank you for hospitality until the next year.

Great customer service! He showed us how to use all the amenities within the room. He was extremely professional and made us feel at home at the same time. I would highly recommend him as an employee!

He was extremely helpful in accommodating my requests for me and my partner. He efficiently got us check-in and was very generous, giving us the best room with a great view! Fantastic employee and extremely helpful!
Alam was fantastic! Showed us fire safety, water refill station, coffee replacement. Very friendly and supper with answering questions. He is great!
We are close to Times Square and stardust restaurant.

Mohamed was super helpful and very friendly. He greeted us very kindly! He explained everything about our room and explained all the perks of being in the heart of New York City! Very thankful for such great service!
Room is very old, bathroom was not renewed, hair dryer was broken and the room service did not got another one at that night.
Just the location was good but that just it.
I can not believe how this hotel got 4 stars?? You can find much more comfortable rooms nearby places..

Traveled to nyc for my sisters bday just to have a couple days away and we already are loving the city. We checked into the executive floor which is great. There were a lot of mixed reviews about the hotel but it is actually nice!
The young lady at the front desk, Aerial checked us in and helped us with a great choice for dinner.
Have not been to Times Square and years and this hotel is the perfect location. There is a subway near on every corner, tons of dining options and great for sightseeing.
When my family and I check-in aerial gave us free breakfast as a welcome gift! Thank you!
Check-in at the Manhattan tonight and was greeted by Ariel at the reception desk with a smile. She answered all my questions, and suggested some really cool things to do in the area. Thanks Ariel!!
My hubby and I are excited to spend the next 2 nights here!!

From the Check-in, Senka was very helpful with the requirements. Senka was nice with my daughters and she advised us what to do as it was our first visit to Manhattan. Next time when we visit NY, we will certainly choose Manhattan at the Time Square.
This hotel was so bad.
The staff would directly ask you to please leave a good review about them, One employee told me "This hotel is s**** but please mention good things about me on TripAdvisor" I found that so terrible.

The hotel itself is really old and disgusting. Mould in the tub and the bed is falling apart. The sink in the bathroom barely works and could not figure out how to turn on the TV. Also, what is this RESORT FEE???? STAY AWAY!
The Hotel room was awful.
Great service, upgraded room for family from Germany.
Senka was very nice, helpful and kind. Hotel was full of standard rooms and she provided a upgrade free of charge. Will come to this Hotel again on the next visit to NYC.
The room was small, which is to be expected for NYC, but did have nice features. The carpet was dirty, needing a really good cleaning...or just rip it up and start over.
The bathroom was a good size.
At check-in, Allison at the front desk qas AWESOME!! She was very friendly and helpful.

My room 2113 21fist floor was lovely clean tidy well looked after by Ayee ramdeo was wonderful with us never to much trouble we enjoyed talking to her she made us feel welcome done great job thank u ayee

Guillermo check me in. awesome service. I made an ealy check-in and he was very welcoming.apprrciate all his efforts. nice talking to him, friendly. I loved the customer service. will definitely recommend to my friends and family. thanks guillermo
First of all, the hotel is in a spectacular central location.
Got a room with a balcony, and when you look over, you can literally see all of Times Square and the NYC Ball drop.

The best part about my stay was the friendly and very helpful staff! I would like to personally thank Mike in bell services, Paolo and Margaruita in Front Desk, and Dolores and Mohammed in the breakfast bar! This group of amazing, awesome people made sure my family and I had everything we needed and more!
Upgraded to executive floor as normal rooms are very dated and had a real musty smell.
Location to Times Square is good, lots of bars and eateries nearby. Good foyer area with coffee and food.
Some really nice staff.
Bathroom is tiny in the normal rooms as one friend put it she could sit on the toilet to put her makeup on.

We arrived at the hotel and Mohameed welcomed us with a huge smile. He answered all our questions and insecurities. We felt like we were home. This is not the end he explain us everything and advice us to go to a lot of place. Our trip to new york was fantastic and even more when having great service like this. Thank you Mohameed for your great service !!

When we arrived to the hotel we were well welcom by the staff, especially by Alam. He was really nice to us, he helped us in our luggages and show us around. It was a really good experience and i recommend it for everyone !!
Of course this hotel room and service is good, in addition they have good breakfast service.
in the morning u can eat sweet donuts and good taste coffee. every morning I really enjoyed that.

We went to this hotel in august and the service at the bar was wonderful . Mohammed and Dolores were very helpful, kind , smiling .they are very professional and they take care of guest .excellent customer service.if we will come back in this hotel it would be for them .
I really enjoyed my stay there.
The walk to time square was about 2 blocks convenient to everything from high end restaurants to KFC. We loved it.
The only disadvantage was no refrigerator or microwave it could be because it is a older hotel.
Everyone was nice and helpful I would definitely stay there again.
Very friendly! As soon as we check-in, they were both very welcoming. Explained everything we needed to know and established us in our room in a very professional way.
The hotel is in an awesome location, walking distance to a lot of places.
Stayed on the New executive floor and it is very clean and very modern.

Alam was very friendly and helpful he showed us everything we needed to know at the hotel he told us about breakfast service how to make calls internationally where all the fire exits are and Alison gave us a room with a lovely view

After a 12 hour overnight bus ride from Toronto due to cancelled flight, we were met by hotel reception staff to inform us that our room was not ready even though the hotel room was fully paid for a week starting 2 day prior so we have to wait till the room is fully serviced.

Thankfully Ms. Dolly and Mr. Mohammed from the lobby cafeteria served us good breakfast, so friendly they talk to us like we were old friends that we forgot how tired we were from the overnight drive from Toronto. These two staff should be given highest appreciation.

Star was very helpful at check-in we truly are so greatful to have met her during our stay here in newyork she was extremely patient and answered all of our first timer questions. Thank you so much Star

We recently stayed at Manhattan Hotel Times Square and had the pleasure of meeting Starr during our check-in. She was very patient and went over and above to help us get settled in. She is truly an asset to your establishment.

One week at the Manhattan at times, rooms damp and dirty, shower and bath filthy,carpets damp...walls scuffed...shower dripping,.kettle is a cheap coffee maker that dripped out hot water...outdated... only saving grace is zip code and great cleaners.
Hotel location is right near Times Square.
The most impressive thing which I experienced was - Hospitality. I travelled with my family to NY for very first time
Mrs Senka got to know about it she gave a helping hand to make sure I had all I need for my family. I made a right choice of hotel for my first visit to NY
Me and my family have been their in holiday it is was strategic position with very professional staff .
Room very clean,
design and modern  WiFi very good quality
Room service very discreet and professional  the equipment is like 4 stars
We were tired and early for check-in this is our fifth time to this hotel. Mohammed helped us to get room early and gave us information. Thank you so much.
The worse hotel I have ever stayed in, so dirty and smells stale, rooms have never been hovered the bedding had stains on the, the bathroom was covered in mould
the staff do not care they are rude.
We ended up paying more and moving to the Sheraton across the road
I would never recommend this hotel! only the position is excellent.
The rooms are old and the bathrooms are not clean.
the staff is not excellent at all.

I forgot two jackets in the closet of my room and I communicated what happened by mail, telephone and messenger. Nobody gave me information. I called them several times and they hung up on me! It is unacceptable that my jackets have disappeared and no one is able to give me an answer. this means that the staff is unreliable. I want to clarify that I communicated my forgetfulness only one day after the check-out.
We had a very good time at the hotel which is in a great location for many shops, restaurants and transport.
The hotel is old but clean.
The staff are very friendly especially Valerie very professional and great, thank you.

Senka is one of my favorite employees at The Manhattan Hotel at Times Squre. Senka works at the front desk and is always helpful and accommodative to my requests. Ricardo is another favorite and is friendly and helpful. I travel often to New York for work and love the location and accommodations.
I love the location of this hotel, it is walking distance to everything.

Our flight was a red eye and Mohammed at the front desk did his very best to get us in a room earlier then the check-in time. He was so kind and awesome. My two favorite employees are Mohammed and William at the Grab and Go Breakfast.

They are so friendly and kind and greeted my daughter and I with a smile and conversation every morning. My daughter had a sore throat and William jumped at making her a hot drink for her throat. I have stayed at the hotel a few times and the service and friendly employees keeps me coming back. I was in the hotel business for many years and this hotel cares about customer service and going the extra mile. Praise to all your staff and especially Mohammed and William from the Grab and Go, they are friendly and kind.
What a disappointment! When I walked into the lobby, I knew it was going to be bad.
The lobby furniture was disgusting—torn and stained sofas, scratched up tables— it looked like a furniture you’d see on the curb.
So then the room...it stunk! Smelled like cat pee.
The night stand had some stickers all over it. I guess the hotel did not care that someone let their toddler decorate. The walls needed to be washed.
It desperately needs to be updated.
The only good thing I can say about our stay was that the staff was friendly.
But I will never stay here again and I will make sure none of my friends pick this dump either.

Arrived today and rather disappointed with actual quality of our stand family room compared to the images shown on bookings.com and tripadvisr - rather dated and a little 3 star. On the other hand Senka on the front desk has been 5Star with some great advice and service to make our stay better.

Excellent accommodation, welcoming and helpful stuff, especially the lady called Senka, she was a wonderful person, warm-hearted and kind. I’d love to stay here for more, but I guess another time than. Amazing vacations!
Guillermo treated us well, suggested us on what all we can plan to do in New York. Also assisted us with an early check-in.
The lobby of the hotel is nice. Getting a room with a view on 21st floor. We are all set to have a good time in New York.
The front desk people were very helpful specially Mohammad.
Only issue was that the rooms were small and needs uplifts.

Hotel is great. I stayed here last year. All employees are wonderful and friendly to me. Senka from the reception checked me in and she was really helpful. I am highly thankful and happy to be here. All the great things to say.
Thought the size of the room was great.
The room was clean with the beds made daily.

Overall, the hotel is a little dated. The walls are very thin so we could hear people in the surrounding rooms. The TV did not work but we were out exploring most of the time so it did not bother us too much. This is a no frills, budget hotel
in an excellent location.
The hotel is very well located and looks very nice.
The service at the reception was great and Mohammad, the receptionist, was very friendly and helpful so that we could have the best stay. I hope to be back at The Manhattan soon
The room was big enough to accommodate two office colleagues and that is a lot to say about a hotel room in NYC, which are usually smaller.
Shower pressure, internet connection and sheets were ok too.
Special thanks to Mr. Gene Faulk for all his help with our luggage.

Mohammad and Miss Dolly.. the two baristas that worked in my hotel really took such good care of me and my family They were extremely helpful and friendly! Honestly it made me want to come back to the Manhattan hotel just to see them Thanks you guys
This is the best hotel I have ever been befere. The service is really good
the rooms are really comfortable.
The breakfast is also great.
Especially Mohammed or Dolly Were really welcoming helpful and polite with us. Great service.
Our stay at this place was really comfortable.
Location is very convenient and in the heart of the city.
The staff was good and especially Mohammed and dolly took really good care of us. They are really friendly yet professional. Will definately visit this place again.

Thank you Eddie for your wonderful assistance. He was very accommodating and he knew what the client wants. I arrived early than my booking and he made it sure that the room would be ready as soon as possible. He even guided me on the things to in New York since that was my first time in the Big Apple. He Good job Eddie at the reception!

The responsibles at the breakfast, like mohammed and dolly are awesome. They are always looking to make our meal better, asking if everything is fine, always smiling and helping whith whatever we need.
I visited motels on highways and small basic hotels and were much cleaner than this one.
Dont be deceived by the nice smell in the lobby.
Rooms has very bad smell of carpet. Old furniture. Dirty bathrooms with odor and black mold all around doors and corners.
Crowded lobby and scary corridors.
Receptionist unfriendly and rude .

Good staff Senka, Perfect hotel conditions, comfortable beds and rooms.  There is a welcoming staff who took care of everything we needed. I would recommend this to my relatives and friends because it is worth it.

Recently spending 4 nights here. Ideally located. Easy Access to Subway. Walking distance Times Square or Rockefeller Centre or Central Park or Empire State Building and Maddison Square Garden, The room was a tad small but quite comfortable. No shortage of eating options with great restaurants just a stroll away. Would definitely return.

We arrived too early for our check-in soaked to the core, but Senka helped get us checked in early so we could dry off and start enjoying our vacation. She was delightful and efficient. We appreciate her extra efforts
The experience was awesome and the service was great. Mohammed and dolly were very kind and helpful.
The hotel was very clean
the staff met every request in prompt fashion and with extreme care. I look forward to returning.

Guillermo at the front desk was outstanding in hospitality! Right from the start it is nice and fresh to receive a smile and will to support and help us out. This is my first time in NYC and he certainly was helpful
Thanks for all SENKA  If you need something, ask her at Reception  She is friendly, kind and answer at whatever you need   I will be back next year juste for you  Thanks you so much for everythings
Hotel is in great location
But the rooms needs to renew
The hotel has a Starbucks and I have met Mohammed Dolly in the Starbucks, he is a good guy and friendly.
The location is the best thing with this hotel if you looking for stay nearby Times Square, I will highly recommended this hotel

Came to new York for my 50th birthday staying at the manhattan at times square hotel staff very friendly and helpful especially Ayee Ramdeo who was very efitiant at her job cleaning the room and helpfull with questions we had regarding our stay in new York
Very good customer service polite and professional.  Very helpful Gave direction to the nearest mall and areas to shop.
Hotel is in a great location. Will come back  Kudos to Aerial she was awesome Thank you

Great service and great manner from Aerial. Helped us with service and answered questions of all sort. Gave a great vibe and gave good advice on what to do and how to cooperate around the city of New York. Thanks. Great service and manner.
We have stayed at this hotel for well over 30 years, back to when it was a Sheraton.
The location is convenient to Times Square and Broadway. They have an on-site parking garage and it is a very easy drive off of the West Side highway.
Our room was recently redone and just gorgeous.
They staff is always helpful and friendly but they went above and beyond this trip.

Eyes Ramdeo was very helpful and was very friendly when she was in cleaning the room gave me towels and coffee took time to answer questions I had about my stay in new York room was very clean appeared nothing was to much trouble

I am a New Yorker, born in the Bronx, lived in Brooklyn most of my life. Moved to the MidWest last year, and returned to NYC for a short visit. Due to a last minute issue in my planning, I ended up staying here for one night in late July. It was perfect! Staff at the front desk gave me room 2238, check-in and check-out were each fast and easy.
Stayed for just a night but was very impressed. It was the best deal during peak season in this location. Big shout out Aerial at reception who gave us an awesome room
Rooms were clean, great air conditioning, amenities.
But the location is the best
18th floor amazing with express elevator our room was perfect big clean and comfortable
Shout out to Ludimila ensuring our room was perfect and Gloria for all there help with our tours,shopping and Yankee tickets we will be back again to NYC
We booked in yesterday after flying in from UK. Was told our room was not ready. Went back down to lobby - very basic. Room was clean 30 mins later, however - extremely dated and worn out.
Furniture very old. Only one socket that works. One bedside lamp does not work. Bathroom dated, paintwork chipped.
Charged a resort fee of 34 dollars per night for wifi and water. Cannot recommend.
Website says it is a 4 star hotel. The only 4 star thing about it is the location.
Nice and clean hotel
Perfect location. We stayed there twice at the start and end of our vacation to ensure central location.
We had a fantastic service from Senka in the reception. In general we were met with great hospitality from all staff.

This hotel has to be seen to be believed. We arrived at the hotel late at night and had requested a room away from the elevators. Our room was directly facing the elevators. The front desk spent time arguing how we could have been closer to the elevators. I am not sure how
Thanks to the manager who eventually relocated us.
The corridors are in desperate need of repair with scratched doors etc.
The room itself is not properly cleaned.
When the bathroom floor gets wet the grime and black shows on the floor. Really not pleasant.
The hotel has a fab location and should be attracting great reviews.
Hopefully a refurbishment will be planned along with some staff training to make this a wonderful and special place to stay.

Guillermo was extremely helpful when we came in and asked for a room the afternoon of august 8th. We came in not knowing much around because it was our first time in New York and he talked to us about what was around the hotel and even gave us tips on where to go. He definitely gave an amazing impression and we will be back again. He is an amazing employee, very welcoming.
Hotel lobby is amazing when you walk in and there is a great scent also.
The hotel is not what I expected. Rooms are very much worn, carpet is old, and everything is outdated but
the service is great. Ariel helped us with a lot of restaurants and directions.
We choose this hotel for proximity to Times Square and it was perfect.
The hotel lobby is gorgeous and clean,
reception staff and concierge were super helpful.  The concierge even called and made dinner reservations for us, and she was spot on for a recommendation for good italian food.
Couple small issues, our first room had the knob broken off of the in room heator air unit, so no way to control temperature.
But overall, very pleasant stay, clean hotel in great location. We would stay here again.

I booked this hotel because the Park Central was not available. It looks good from the outside. Unfortunately, that is where the good looks ended. The carpet on our floor was buckled and ripped in places. The bathroom had mold all over the 1970 pink tile. The beds were comfortable but did not even have bedspreads. It is a good thing we just stayed one night on a layover.
The staff were kind. I think they also rent rooms for longer-term stay, as I hear someone say that some people lived there.
The room in this hotel is not very clean.
Good location.
Very old furniture, dirty floor. One elevator broken, the other two working very bad.
Poor breakfast.
But very nice people, especially to the reception.
First the location in the middle of Time Square. So closed to Ellen Stardust you have to go there for a fun dinner.

Then the room ... some said it s a little bit old ... true , but if you take the advice of the wonderful employee Alisson, you change your room for one of the 18th floor. And it changes everything! Private elevator, very nice room, bed and bathroom. Thx again Alisson Everybody is so nice, perfect conciergerie.
And I love the way to have breakfast drinkor fruitor croissant and you can leave for visiting if you want to. So, in one word perfect

Everyone has been amazing Most thanks to Allison for making the check-in process so easy and quick. She did her best to get us a room as quick as possible and gave us a ton of information for what to do in the city. Thanks to Alam as well. Amazing guy.. helped with our bags and made sure everything was fantastic in our room before he left. Great service. Highly recommend coming back here. We will be back. Allison and Alam you guys are fantastic thx for making everything so easy

New to New York, in a crazy difficult town, the staff was amazingly helpful, getting everything in order immediately upon our arrival. Upgraded room, with everything we could need! Wonderful staff. Thankful for them.

We enjoyed our vacation at The Manhattan at Times Square mostly for the breakfast service John and Mohammed are the best workers we could ever imagine.  Professional, nice and kind: we can not find any other words to describe them

The hotel was lovely. Aeriel made our experience the best. She helped us find a room that would accomodate our entire family and was very nice, friendly and kind. I would love all employees to be like her.
Nice lobby and good location.
Has not been updated in decades stained rugs, broken outlets, dirty bathrooms, and evidence of people living there If we did not prepay, we never would have stayed both nights.
The Manhattan has become our favorite place to stay we make quarterly trips into the city and stay 2-4 nights at The Manhattan depending on your planned activities.
The staff is great, both Mohammad and Alam were accommodating and friendly, providing excellent service.
We stayed in the junior executive suite and were very satisfied with our accommodations.

This hotel is the finest. The front desk staff especially Allison is so nice. She makes you feel at home even if you are out alone. I was scared because it was my first time to New York and I was by myself. However Allison made me feel so welcome. Let me feel as if I was not alone. She made the stay so wonderful I wished I could have stayed for more than just one night. I know that my stay would have been even more wonderful. Everyone smiled at me and made me feel so welcomed. I invite everyone to come and stay at this hotel . If you do ask for Allison . Her smile alone will make you feel welcomed. Thanks so much. I have never felt so welcomed in my life.

He was especially helpful showing us around, was friendly I definitely would recommend this hotel to anyone.  Allison was a great help at the front desk.   All of the questions we had about the room were answered.
Allison was the best of the Hotel , a receptionist of the Hotel and she was very friendly and helpfuly. This make me come again to this Hotel in Mahattan.

At check-in we were assisted by Allison a receptionist of the Manhattan at Times at Times Square hotel, and she was very kind, friendly and helpful. She was quick, and have put in some request earlier and all was fulfilled. That was a really excellent service from her.
Well located hotel, close to transportation to move around NY.
The staff is wonderful specially Dolly. A plus for the water purifier and the long distance calls.
The hotel is nice but needs to be renovated.
Breakfast is very good
Mohammed and Dolly are very very kind.
Location is beautiful and comfortable. Hotel is very good location clistere to everything, Times square and Train station. We come back again
Perfect location on Times Square.

Allison was extremely helpful at the front desk and very friendly. Alam was awesome and such a great help also. Highly recommend seeing these two here for a perfect stay in NYC. Thank you both so much
Mohammed and Dolly were very nice and gave us an excellent service. We stayed 3 days here,
the hotel location was very nice although
the bathroom conditions were not the best and the hotel needs a clear modernization.
